DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

This card's primary effects are active while in your hand. A Gift may also have an additional effects with triggers.
Blasted creatures lose both HP and Max HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, the blast worsens, but the worse the blast is the more likely it is to wear off.

This turn, the Wanted enemy becomes the target of all attacks and negative effects. NL The Wanted enemy will not injure itself by default.

Gain more Block the next time a Block gaining card is played.
This card Retains while it has uses, and immediately Exhausts when it is out. One use is consumed when this card's primary effect triggers.
If a target with a mark is hit for... NL 6 or less damage: Raise the damage to 7 and ignore block. NL 7 or more damage: Gain 3 temporary HP. NL One mark then consumed.

This card gives only as much #yBlock as needed, determined by your current block and the intent of your enemies. The remaining amount will be given as #yVigor.

A stunned target does nothing this turn.
The primary target takes the full effect. ALL OTHER targets take half the amount.

The card's effect is automatically activated and the card is immediately purged. This does not count as playing the card.
